I am responsible for the development of the Quality Engineering discipline there.Â Glad to see you as a part of our local testing team.Â \\nWe will work together on a vast number of exciting tasks and meet on the different working events and extra activities, project and non-project, educational and entertaining ones.Â \\nYou can contact me in case you have any open question about your professional and career development, or just any idea to highlight.\\nMaybe you heard the phrase: think globally, act locally.
